item.title: Adventures with the Spotify Millions Playlist Dataset
item.description: I recently came across a competition hosted on AIcrowd, where the challenge was to solve the problem of generating recommendations for user playlists from older songs and metadata in their playlists. I decided to take on the problem and see how far I could get with it. Dataset The dataset consists

item.title: Skip Prediction on Spotify
item.description: Trying to predict whether users would skip a song on spotify,from data about users listening sessions.
